page.title: 04SOUTH NORMANTON NEWS.
page.content: 3. There is going to be a leisure complex in our area,on the Broadmeadows housing estate.It will cost thousands of pounds and will have football pitches also used for netball tennis and hockey,roller skating rinks,a bowling green and an artificial ski slope.The decision to build this complex was held at a recent meeting of county officials and the sports council. 4. An old post windmill once sited on Alfreton Rood,South Normanton is being lent to Notts County Council.The County Council are borrowing the mill and restoring it to use as an exhibit at the Sherwood Forest Flower Festival.
